

```{r}
#Q1
require(jsonlite)
data <- fromJSON('Housing2122.json')
data <- as.data.frame(data)
data
```

```{r}
#Q2
Sys.setlocale("LC_TIME", "English")
data$date <- gsub("nd|st", "", data$date)
data$date <- as.Date(data$date, format = "%d %b %Y")
data$date <- format(data$date, "%e/%m/%Y")
data
```

```{r}
#Q3
data[is.na(data$sq.),c('sq.')] <- "0s"
data
```



```{r}
#Q4
require(stringr)
data$TotalBed <- as.numeric(str_extract(str_extract(data$types,"[0-9]* (bed)"),"[0-9]*"))
data[is.na(data$TotalBed),c("TotalBed")] <- 0
```

```{r}
data
```
